messages.subject: video games and relationships
messages.msgSnippet: The past few days have been non-stop for me and it s fun but confusing.  I don t think I sent these links to this list, and I meant to.   I had two e-mails
messages.messageBody:
The past few days have been non-stop for me and it's fun but
confusing. I don't think I sent these links to this list, and I
meant to. I had two e-mails about this and it's very cool:



============================================

I see that Zachary interviewed you last month (in his footnotes), so
it's likely you've seen these. Just in case you haven't, here are
the links. Your quotes are at the top of his blog post and set the tone:

http://zajosa.blogspot.com/
==============================================

"I'm not sure if Zach sent you his final essays but he gave me
permission to post them and I've got a link to them on my blog here:
http://www.zamunzo.blogspot.com (2nd post down)

"There's been quite a lot of reaction to it. I haven't posted about
it to any lists so the traffic has been purely blog-word-of-mouth."
============================================
